long_description: An essential travel accessory-briefcases, backpacks, roof-rack luggage, golf bags and bicycles-Wrapsafe(TM) secures it all! High-tensile stainless-steel cable is 8 ft. long and fits around any item up to 67 in. in circumference. Adjustable, allowing you to link together luggage, bags and packs in one large, secure grouping. Lightweight and flexible enough to take anywhere; just wrap it around, cinch it shut and lock it to any secure fixture. Comes complete with combination lock and carry pouch. Please note: Lock is not Travel Sentry(TM) approved; locks that are approved allow airport screeners access without damaging the lock.
short_description: An essential travel accessory-briefcases, backpacks, roof-rack luggage, golf bags and bicycles-Wrapsafe(TM) secures it all!
